      Methods in GenotypeGraph with parameters of type GenotypeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GenotypeNode.add(GenotypeNode other)
      Adds a node to the adjacency list of this node NOTE: there is no control on the meaning of the values of the genotype (eg. to which gene they are associated with)
      protected void GenotypeNode.addParent(GenotypeNode other)
      Adds a node to the parent list of this node NOTE: there is no control on the meaning of the values of the genotype (eg. to which gene they are associated with)
      int GenotypeNode.compareTo(GenotypeNode other) 
      boolean GenotypeNode.contains(GenotypeNode other)
      Checks if this node has a genotype containing one mutation more than the other node
      java.lang.String GenotypeGraph.nodeLabel(GenotypeNode node) 
      private java.lang.Double WeightedGenotypeGraph.setDownWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself)
      private java.lang.Double WeightedGenotypeGraph.setUpWeightsRec(GenotypeNode node)
      DP procedure to efficiently compute the sum of all the weights of nodes reachable by a specified node (excluding itself) following reverse edges
      void WeightedGenotypeGraph.toDotNode(GenotypeNode node)

      prints a node in dot format
